lsystem.util

Class ArcBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsystem.util.ArcBall

  • public class ArcBall
extends Object
    Supports the ArcBall and MouseWheel zoom manipulation of objects in processing

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArcBall(PApplet parent)
      Default centered arcball and half width or half height whichever smaller
      ArcBall(PApplet parent, float center_x, float center_y, float radius)
